word:
502
     When the great sacrifice had been consummated, Christ ascended on high, refusing the adoration of angels until he had presented the request, \93I will that they also, whom thou hast given me, be with me where I am.\94 [John 17:24.] Then with inexpressible love and power came forth the answer from the Father's throne, \93Let all the angels of God worship him.\94 [Hebrews 1:6.] Not a stain rested upon Jesus. His humiliation ended, his sacrifice completed, there was given unto him a name that is above every name.
